data.text: Názu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yɛni fiilɛ wolai zu, é Zɔɓe wooɠaaʋote, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ɓɛ ɠa ga ɗe, è ʋa nà-deveiti gaaʋala ba ga ɠimalala ɓɔɛzuɠulaiti?
Ɗa-zaamaɠiligi ɠili eɠɛ ziilo nui,
Mini ɠa è ɠɛni ná,
Ɓɛ ɠa é ma ɠɔɠɔgiti toni, è kwɛni ɓaa?
Ná-tɔkpalaiti kɔɠɔi lɔɔʋɛ ɓɛgele zu?
siɛgi zu sobui somideɠaiti ti ɠɛni guyei loozu la ʋɔɔma,
«Ɓɛ ɠa é daaɠuluni kpoloɗɛi ma,
siɛgi zu gè tonaɓiingi ɠɛɛni la ga maazeɠei,
gè pele ɓesani ná-kpizɛi luɠɔ, gè kwɛteʋe,
Gè boni ma ga:
«Kaipa è ɠulani etea, è sobui levea ná ɠɛ liele,
é zooi lakɔlɔgi zo, é suɓukpunɛ,
Naazu zooi ɠa valibo, eɠɛ penɛi nu zoo è yeeʋozɛ ba,
Kɛlɛ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti balagɛ ta-wozakalagi ma,
«È zeelia nɛi kpoloɗɛi nɔungi zu?
Saai ma ziɠidaʋɛti, ti ɠulani nɛi è ʋɛ kɛlɛma?
È eteai ɠaawɔɔlɔ ʋelei ʋɛtɛga nɛi?
«Pelei ɠa mini, nii é liizu wozakalagi zeizuʋɛ,
ga è zoo è gaaɠa, ʋɛ ti yeeɠaaɠwɛɛzu ná,
È maanɛɛʋɛ è naati kpein kwɛɛ, mazɔlɔɔ è zɔlɔɔni niina,
«È lia kɔɔlɛ vukɔi makɛsuʋɛ,
nii gè puai ɠoba, maanɔɠɔ voloi ʋɛ,
Pelei ɠa mini, wozakalagi a ɗa ɠula la, gaa ɗa ɠwɛ,
«Ɓɛ ɠa é pelei laani sabalagi ʋɛ,
ga tonai pu zooi ma, ʋɛ nu la ná,
ga é zou vɔɔi yɛɓɛ, adaʋɛ náti fɔai,
Kɛɛɠɛ ɠa nɛi tonai ʋɛ?
Ɓɛ ɠoozu ɠa kɔɔlɛi ɠulaai ná?
Siɛgi zu é ziɛi ɓuunsu da, naa ɠa ɓaa kpekpe eɠɛ kɔtui,
«Geezu ʋoogi daa ga ‹Peleyadegiti›, ɗa zoo è galui lo ba,
Ɗa zoo è poogiti kula kɛlɛma ta-yeeɠɛɠalaiti ma?
È geeɠɔlɔgi zu lɔgiti kwɛɛ nɛi?
«Ɗa wooɠula tonaɓiingi ma,
Ɗa ɠa ɗa ɗa mainmain leve,
Ɓɛ ɠa é ɠimalai lɔa nuɓusɛi yiimaʋɛ,
Ɓɛ ɠa a zoo é tonaɓiingi ɠaalu ga ɠimalai maaʋele,
siɛgi zu fufiligi ɓaazu la kpe eɠɛ kɔtu,
«Ɗa zoo è dosoi ɠɛ, è zala zaai laamianigi zo bɛ,
siɛgi zu ti ʋɛɛni la ta-yeɠei zu,
Ɓɛ ɠa a ɗa kalawɔnii ná-daamianigi ɓɛtɛ bɛ,
